SEARCH
Package com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.services

Class ProfileManager

java.lang.Object
com.oap2024team7.team7mediastreamingapp.services.ProfileManager
public class ProfileManager extends Object
Class for the ProfileManager object. This class is responsible for managing the profile data in the database. It provides methods for registering, updating and deleting profiles, as well as getting profile information.
Author:
Agata (Agy) Olaussen (@agyCoding)
